channel.title: CVE Feed for GeoVision -- Door Access Control Device
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GeoVision -- Door Access Control Device

item.title: CVE-2020-3930|2024-08-04T07:52:20.429Z -- geovision -- door%20access%20control%20device
item.description: GeoVision Door Access Control device family improperly stores and controls access to system logs, any users can read these logs.

item.title: CVE-2020-3928|2024-08-04T07:52:19.776Z -- geovision -- door%20access%20control%20device
item.description: GeoVision Door Access Control device family is hardcoded with a root password, which adopting an identical password in all devices.

item.title: CVE-2020-3929|2024-08-04T07:52:19.823Z -- geovision -- door%20access%20control%20device
item.description: GeoVision Door Access Control device family employs shared cryptographic private keys for SSH and HTTPS. Attackers may conduct MITM attack with the derived keys and plaintext recover of encrypted messages.

item.title: CVE-2020-3931|2024-08-04T07:52:20.501Z -- geovision -- door%20access%20control%20device
item.description: Buffer overflow exists in Geovision Door Access Control device family, an unauthenticated remote attacker can execute arbitrary command.
